name: Spooky Helper
description:
Spooky Helper

disclaimer: The release is in a few hours, but its full of bugs and you're so tired you can't keep coding, that's the code ghost job! but beware! you can't be so scared at the end.

Gameplay:

Oh no!!! Remember when you were alive and you used to code games all the time? Now in the afer life is your chance to make even greater games by helping the living developers. 

How to play:
  • Click over the screen to move.
  • Click over some objects to interact with them.
